sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script updated the Program Task and Program Version to 2.</description> <name>Update Program and Program Task Version</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('planned_task'); mUpdate.addQuery("sys_class_name", "IN", "pm_program,pm_program_task"); mUpdate.addNullQuery("version"); mUpdate.setValue("version", "2"); mUpdate.execute();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-04 00:33:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2bb673599f113200598a5bb0657fcf9c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Program and Program Task Version</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Program Management" source="com.snc.program_management">1110926b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d433e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2bb673599f113200598a5bb0657fcf9c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-03-04 00:35:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Program and Program Task Version
